section.name: FIN_PUT_DBC_RCO
section.code: *<<<< FIN_PUT_DBC_RCO MOVE DBC-GLS-NOMC IN DBC TO CPT-STRN. PERFORM CPT-BLKS. MOVE CPT-STRN TO DBC-GLS-NOMC IN RCO-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_RET_OPE_RCO
section.code: *<<<< FIN_RET_OPE_RCO MOVE OPE-COD-COPR IN RCO-FLD TO RCO-COD-COPR IN RCO. *>>>>

section.name: INI_VAL_CON_IKY_RCO
section.code: *<<<< INI_VAL_CON_IKY_RCO IF RCO-CAI-IOPE IN RCO-FLD > SPACES AND RCO-IIC-IOPE IN RCO-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'RCOIOPENOCON' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-IKY-RCO. * CONDICION 3 ( ICLI (NOMBRE O IDC) + IOPE ) IF NOT (( DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCO-FLD > ZEROES OR DBC-GLS-NOMC IN RCO-FLD > SPACES ) AND RCO-IIC-IOPE IN RCO-FLD > ZEROES ) MOVE 'GNS' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'VALCONIKY' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-IKY-RCO. *>>>>

section.name: INI_VAL_CON_KEY_RCO
section.code: *<<<< INI_VAL_CON_KEY_RCO IF RCO-CAI-IOPE IN RCO-FLD > SPACES AND RCO-IIC-IOPE IN RCO-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'RCOIOPENOCON' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-KEY-RCO. * CONDICION 1 ( SOLO ICLI (NOMBRE O IDC) ) IF NOT ((( DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCO-FLD > ZEROES OR DBC-GLS-NOMC IN RCO-FLD > SPACES ) AND RCO-IIC-IOPE IN RCO-FLD NOT > ZEROES ) OR * CONDICION 2 ( SOLO IOPE ) ( RCO-IIC-IOPE IN RCO-FLD > ZEROES AND DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCO-FLD NOT > ZEROES AND DBC-GLS-NOMC IN RCO-FLD NOT > SPACES ) OR * CONDICION 3 ( ICLI (NOMBRE O IDC) + IOPE ) (( DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCO-FLD > ZEROES OR DBC-GLS-NOMC IN RCO-FLD > SPACES ) AND RCO-IIC-IOPE IN RCO-FLD > ZEROES )) MOVE 'GNS' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'VALCONKEY' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-KEY-RCO. *>>>>

section.name: NOT PGM_PER AND DBC_GLS_ICLI
section.code: *<<<< DBC_GLS_ICLI MOVE DBC-GLS-ICLI IN RCO-FLD TO IDC-GLS-RUTV. PERFORM VAL-GLS. MOVE IDC-GLS-RUTV TO DBC-GLS-ICLI IN RCO-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: NOT PGM_PER AND DBC_IND_ICLI
section.code: *<<<< DBC_IND_ICLI MOVE DBC-IND-ICLI IN RCO-FLD TO IDC-IND-RUTV. PERFORM VAL-IDC. MOVE IDC-IND-RUTV TO DBC-IND-ICLI IN RCO-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: NOT PGM_PER AND DBC_VRF_ICLI
section.code: *<<<< DBC_VRF_ICLI MOVE IDC-ZERO-S TO IDC-ZERO. MOVE DBC-NUM-ICLI IN RCO-FLD TO IDC-NUM-RUTV. MOVE DBC-VRF-ICLI IN RCO-FLD TO IDC-VRF-RUTV. PERFORM VAL-RUT. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_BU AND INI_VAL_FLD_RCO
section.code: *<<<< PERFORM VAL-OPE-MSC-TVOP. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO OPE-MSC-TVOP-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-OPE-COD-TOPR. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO OPE-COD-TOPR-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-OPE-COD-OFOP. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO OPE-COD-OFOP-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-FRM-GLS-TVOP. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO FRM-GLS-TVOP-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-FRM-GLS-TOPR. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO FRM-GLS-TOPR-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-FRM-GLS-OFOP. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO FRM-GLS-OFOP-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-RCO-NUM-DIRE. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO RCO-NUM-DIRE-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-RCO-COD-STAT. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO RCO-COD-STAT-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-OPE-IND-MCLI. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO OPE-IND-MCLI-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-FRM-GLS-STAT. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO FRM-GLS-STAT-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-FRM-GLS-MCLI. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO FRM-GLS-MCLI-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-RCO-COD-RCOP. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO RCO-COD-RCOP-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-RCO-VAL-PRCO. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO RCO-VAL-PRCO-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-FRM-GLS-RCOP. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO FRM-GLS-RCOP-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. PERFORM VAL-OPE-COD-COPR. IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO OPE-COD-COPR-LEN IN RCO-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-RCO. *>>>>

section.name: RCO_NUM_DIRE
section.code: *<<<< RCO_NUM_DIRE IF RCO-NUM-DIRE IN RCO-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE RCO-CAI-ICLI IN RCO-FLD TO DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBC MOVE RCO-IIC-ICLI IN RCO-FLD TO DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBC MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SGC-FIO-DBC IF FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE DBC-NUM-DCOR IN DBC TO RCO-NUM-DIRE IN RCO-FLD. MOVE RCO-CAI-ICLI IN RCO-FLD TO RCD-CAI-ICLI IN RCD. MOVE RCO-IIC-ICLI IN RCO-FLD TO RCD-IIC-ICLI IN RCD. MOVE RCO-NUM-DIRE IN RCO-FLD TO RCD-NUM-DIRE IN RCD. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM SGC-FIO-RCD. IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMDIRENEX ' TO MSG-COD-MENS IN MSG PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. *>>>>

section.name: RCO_VAL_PRCO
section.code: *<<<< RCO_VAL_PRCO IF RCO-VAL-PRCO IN RCO-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE 100 TO RCO-VAL-PRCO IN RCO-FLD. *DAD IF RCO-VAL-PRCO IN RCO-FLD > 100 MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'VALPRCO100>' TO MSG-COD-MENS IN MSG PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. *>>>>
